content: celebrate earth day everyday with this oval rag rug made from fabric scraps or bed sheeets or any other fabric that you can cut into strips as always i have a youtube video here showing how to make this https //youtu be/o4vmcvbu2_e list=pl967a411a9d90aa96 enjoy donna wolfe from naztazia http //naztazia com http //youtube com/naztazia http //facebook com/naztazia
